alert.note: Alert for Blaine; Chouteau; Fergus; Hill; Judith Basin (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 9:25PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Judith Basin, Fergus, southern Blaine, southeastern Hill and eastern Chouteau Counties through 1030 PM MDT... At 924 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles east of Big Sandy to 14 miles northwest of Winifred to 17 miles east of Denton to 25 miles southwest of Hobson. Movement was east at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lewistown, Big Sandy, Stanford, Denton, Hobson, Winifred, Moore, Grass Range, Parker School, Hays, Azure, Agency, St. Pierre, Sangrey, Boneau, Box Elder, Roy, Fergus, Windham and Forestgrove. This includes the following highways... Highway 200 between mile markers 31 and 123. Highway 191 between mile markers 1 and 87. Highway 87 between mile markers 70 and 93. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Blaine; Chouteau; Fergus; Hill; Judith Basin
